purawidya departhamenthuwe da sahayogaya athiwa galthalawa matha natabunwa pawathi dagaba, pilima wahawahansela, kataram ketu galgewal, diya nosidena gal pokuna, siripathula saha sellipi sanrakshanayata piyawara ganna ladi. 2011 janawari masa 19 dina chaithyarajayananwahanseta mangala shila prathisthapanaya kara, gowithanin jiwath wana adampane wasiyange aparimitha kapakirima hethuwen chaithyaya manaram aakarayen prathinirmanaya kirimata apata haki wiya.
